results.name: Index positions of the points with integer coordinates with primary sorting by radius and secondary sorting by polar angle in the counterclockwise square spiral described by A174344 and A274923.
comment: The lists of the ring-wise sorted points is provided in A305575 for x and A305576 for y.
The sequence is a permutation of the integers.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) /* It is assumed that the files a305575 and a305576 contain the second column of the corresponding b-files omitting the initial 0 */
findinspiral(i, j)={my(size=(2*max(abs(i), abs(j))+1)^2); forstep(k=size, 1, -1, if(i==a174344[k]&&j==a274923[k], return(k)))};
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, May 11 2019
